story: The Swap Meet is closing for upgrades and mmaintenance from 4:30pm - 4:45pm PST. No new offers will be accepted after 3pm PST. Please delist your items beforehand.
Bitgem now has a trollbox! Click the chat icon in the lower right corner of this page to display it.
Bitgem V2 is launched! We now feature a marketplace and gem engraving! We will be listing bargains in the swap meet all weekend long
